OrgName.entry: JET - JOBS, EDUCATION AND TRAINING FOR REFUGEES AND EU MIGRANTS

Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers independent living skills to help refugees and EU migrants to move on with their lives settling in the UK. The programme aims to meet the full spectrum of needs around jobs, education and training from building confidence to jobsearch, volunteering and careers advice. Supported by the National Lottery through the Big Lottery Fund. Childcare can be provided for course attendees.
